caption: This photograph captures a captivating night scene featuring a view of the moon partially obscured by passing clouds. The moon appears luminous and nearly full, its surface distinctly visible, adding a serene glow to the night sky. The image is framed by silhouetted coniferous trees, suggesting a forested environment. These trees are densely packed with pointed tops, characteristic of spruces or firs, and dominate the left and middle portions of the frame. The sky, filled with a mix of darker and lighter clouds, contrasts dramatically with the bright moon. This composition creates a mysterious and tranquil mood, highlighting the natural beauty and quietness of a nighttime forest setting.
title: Old growth Douglas fir in the moonlight, in the Olympic National Timberland, Washington. Trees three to four feet in diameter are usually from 150 to 200 years old, those from four to eight feet are 200 to 375 years old and larger trees are 400 to 500 years old.
